# Introduction

This is the introduction to the portfolio of Laurine Seelt.

For the DSFB2 course, we had to make our own portfolio. This is the result. <br>
The topics that I worked on are: <br>
1. Investigating a _C. Elegans_ experiment and doing some data wrangling. <br>
2. Reading two different studies and recreating some code from one of the studies <br>
3. Cleaning up a folder according to the Guerrilla analytics framework <br>
4. Putting my CV in a markdown <br>
5. Spending 32 hours learning a new skill <br>
6. Using GitHub and Zotero <br>
7. Rendering my markdowns to a website <br>
8. Using DBeaver and SQL <br>
9. Creating my own package called .. <br>
10. Making a parameterized markdown <br>
